text: TeleHit is a Mexican cable/satellite television network. It has been broadcasting since 1993. Its main programming is music and music videos. It is a part of Televisa Networks, an affiliate of TelevisaUnivision Mexico, and is also available in various countries in Latin America and United States. Telehit is MTV's second Spanish language music video network. At first, it aired Spanish music. Now it airs a fusion of different musical rhythms, like pop, rock, electronic, hip-hop and reggaeton. Besides music videos, the channel also broadcasts concerts, TV specials and general-interest content for youth. Telehit has also been a platform for hosts and actors to being into Mexican show business. ==Telehit Awards== The Telehit Awards were first presented on November 5, 2008. It was made to commemorate 15 years of airing on Mexican television. These awards recognize the most outstanding artists in music. ==Hosts== ===Current=== *Adina Burak *Ceci Flores *Barbara Islas *Raul Gemeneses *Gwendolyne García Leets *Angie Tadei *Claudio Rodríguez Medellín *Karla Gómez *Mery Roo *Román *Amanda Rosa *Alex Kaffie *Alejandra Bogue *Sergi Mass *Uriel del Toro *Melissa López *Odalys Ramírez *Silvia Olmedo *Karla Luna *Karla Panini *Juan Carlos Nava "El Borrego" *Juan Carlos Casasola *Leia Freitas *Platanito *Kalimba Marichal *Mario Cuevas "La Garra" *Beto y Lalo * Natalia Tellez ===Previous=== *Jorge Van Rankin *Facundo *Diego *Omar Chaparro *Esteban Arce *Sabrina Sabrok *Mónica Noguera *Yolanda Andrade *Montserrat Olivier *Kalinda Cano *Angie Fajardo *Horacio Villalobos *Lino Nava *Alfredo Fernández *Camila Sodi *Poncho Vera *Eduardo España (Margara Francisca) *Paola Rojas *Paula Sánchez *Eduardo Videgaray *Adriana Sodi *José Ramón San Cristóbal *Jonathan Molina *Federico Padilla "Perico" *Rafael Valderrama *Luz Blanchet *Martha Carrillo *Andrea Legarreta *Kristoff ===Featured shows=== ====Current==== * Qué News Telehit * Teleheat * Jellyfish * Top Topos * Tu Talento Mis Contactos * Retro Vibes * Playhit * Hot Songs * Ok Pop * Érase una vez * D - Generaciones * Tinderella * Top 10 K-Pop * Las Lavanderas * La Escuelita Telehit * Guerra de Chistes * La isla del costeño * Colección de oro * Dementes Brillantes * Adictos al Humor ====Past==== *+Mas Nescafé *Calibre 45 *El Calabozo *Telehit Live *Depásonico *Guaguarones S.A. *No Manches *Hi! *Válvula de Escape *Sabrina *Desde Gayola *Fresas con Chile *Toma Libre *Incógnito *Las hijas de la madre Tierra *Black & White *El Planeta de Cabeza *El Pulso *Encuentros Cercanos *El Show del Polaco *Kristoff Presenta ==References== ==Other websites== * Official site * Televisa Networks Category:1993 establishments in North America Category:Television networks
